chat.title: review
chat.message:
Is fetal movement count presence / absence of movement, or is it the formal 6 counts in 2 hours. Should be absence / presence of fetal movement. 
Add option for connection with indigenous liason 
Add: antenatal hand expression teaching for patients over 36 weeks (moremilksooner.com)
Add: distribute collection syringes / bags / supplies for antenatal hand expression
Add: education and discussion of perineal protection strategies
ASA administration in obstetrics should be its own module because it will apply to multiple ordersets for select patients. 
We need a spyhillis in pregnancy module, and it needs to be updated to what these are. 
Many of the consult suggestions will not be applicable in specific sites within northern health, not sure how/if Cerner handles this... maybe should just be consider allied health / specialist consults as available or something generic.

chat.title: correction
chat.message: Please add pantoprazole (or rabeprazole or whatever is on formulary for PPI)

chat.title: GHTN labs
chat.message: Please add GHTN labs (this should be a module) - CBC, AST, ALT, GGT, LDH, urate, urine pr:cr, Cr, GFR, INR/pTT
